remarks.format: ## Remarks This property takes either a 32-bit signed integer or a string as an argument. When specifying the item by string, only the `get` accessor is available. However, when specifying the item by integer, both the `get` and `set` accessors are available.

remarks.format: ## Remarks If you set an item at an index where an item already exists, the existing item is removed and the new item is then assigned to its index position in the collection.
